column1: #text=Baking a cake begins with a good recipe that you want to use .
#text=Follow the recipe to get all the ingredients at the store .
#text=Assuming you have all the ingredients , you will also need to acquire all the tools necessary to bake the cake .
#text=This usually includes measuring cups , mixing bowls , and the actual mixer .
#text=You will then follow the recipe to measure out the ingredients in the exact proportions that the recipe calls for .
#text=This has to be done very accurately else the cake will not bake properly .
#text=Once all the ingredients in the mixing bowl , use the mixer to mix all the ingredients into a nice batter .
#text=Be sure to mix until all the lumps are gone .
#text=Next pre-heat the over to the temperature the recipe calls for .
#text=Once the oven is pre-heated you can pour the cake batter into a cake pan and then put the cake pan into the over .
#text=Set the timer for however long the cake is supposed to bake for and be ready to take out the cake when the timer is done .
#text=Be careful when taking the cake out of the oven as the cake and the over will be extremely hot .
#text=Once the cake cools , you can decorate the cake with icing and other toppings for an enjoyable treat !
